Name: 1770 House
Comments: Took out Saturday night - missed the ambiance of the dining room but the food quality, service, portions and presentation were excellent. Taking out again midweek!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Everything about this restaurant is exquisite from the welcoming fireplace upon entering to the warmed milk served with tea and coffee. Attention to detail is unparalleled.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: My first time and really enjoyed it.  Excellent meal and service.  Great atmosphere - perfect Friday night spot after a long week. We will b back

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Lovely inn & restaurant, excellent service, very good food

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Great food, excellent service, and amazing atmosphere.  I will be returning

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Great meal and service!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: 1770 house consistently has the best food in East Hampton.  The ambiance is wonderful - quiet.  Some may say it's "stuffy" but I disagree. I always have a nice night out eating at 1770 House.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: We need to dine there more often   Worth the drive from Southampton

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Always excellent food and service.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Fantastic chef and cozy warm space.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: The 1770 House is the jewel box of east hampton .the tavern is chic and decorated beautifully comfortable with banquet seating and its  interesting looking at the historic foundation and fireplace.The menu is yummy and the music played  is also a bit of mellow rock and roll history   The lovely tranquil main dining room is quiet with tables spaced well to provide personal space.   Both the food and service in both is first rate. I've been many times and whether it's a regular night.  restaurant week or $17.70 night in the tavern, it's always a special night when we go to The 1770 House.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Every single thing on the menu was AMAZING! Pricey but highly recommended!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Excellent food and great service! The restaurant never disappointed us whenever we went there for dinner. We highly recommend to all white have not tried this restaurant yet. Whatever you order, you will not be disappointed.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Always great food, service is excellent. Great cocktails. Love sitting downstairs in the tavern, very cozy.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: My wife and I love this place and make it an ANNUAL MUST during the winter time in the hamptons. We always end up having a drink by the fireplace and before/or/after a fantastic meal. Highly recommend this place for special occasions.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: The service was absolutely fantastic. The food was amazing as well.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Mid-winter overnight stay was spectacular! Inn and restaurant were outstanding and the staff couldn't have been more charming.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: The hostess wouldnâ€™t seat us at a corner , private table because she said they were committed (room remained 90% empty for the hour we were there). Not her fault but she seated a loud, obnoxious party next to us. Not pleasant.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: No other restaurant in the Hamptons comes close to the atmosphere and food quality of the 1770 house.   There might be places that are 'hot" for a year or two or where you might see more famous people , but this who want fine food in a refined atmosphere go to the 1770 House.   Pricey on Friday and Sat night but the Sunday thru Thursday Prix Fixe is a terrific value.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: As usual, food was delicious, device was excellent, atmosphere was great and all personnel were warm, welcoming and professional.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: We loved our experience at 1770 house. The food was absolutely incredible, the decor was beautiful, and the wait staff were attentive and helpful. Highly recommend! We look forward to coming back again!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Perfection, love this place!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Food was great!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Always an exceptional dinner here.  And this is one of the very few restaurants where you can have a conversation over dinner.  It's quiet enough to hear your friends.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: 1770 is one of my favorite restaurants on Long Island. We decided to stay at the inn the last minute and I am so happy we did. Great service and very clean. I highly really recommend it both the inn and restaurant. We will definitely be back.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: It was lively. Perfect 20th anniversary meal.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: The service was sporadic with one waiter & busboy for the dining room. My cocktail was a watered down run&tonic. The food was delicious.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: The Tavern menu and cooking is excellent, and in a delightful and cozy "old inn tavern" below-ground space from the Revolutionary War era.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Organic chicken, Brussels sprout salad and date cake: the best. The service is consistently impeccable.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Everything was perfect! Will visit again!

Name: 1770 House
Comments: A perfect restaurant, in terms of ambience, service drink, and food.Our servers were very knowledgeable and skilled  about the menu and gracious hospitality.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Always good . one of the best in the Hamptons you can even hear everyone at the table which is rare these days.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: We would go every few months but instead go every few years simply to see if things have changed with the food preparation. They have not.  The menu always tempts but the food is always under-flavored, (not just under-seasoned, which some dishes are), and yet the salad is always too salty.   Frustrating because we are strongly drawn to this elegant room, comforting yet sophisticated inn ambience, superb service, good wine choices, well-made drinks, lovely venue.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Absolutely loved the ambiance and charm of 1770. Waiter was very knowledgeable of food and wine recommendations. The food was amazing we will definitely return !

Name: 1770 House
Comments: I love the chicken cooked to perfection on its bed of delicate mushed potatoes the sticky dates cales is out of this world.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Our meal and service were both excellent

Name: 1770 House
Comments: 1770 House continues to be East Hamptons best restaurant....Creative menu, great service and a sensational value during restaurant week.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Best place in East Hampton. They are consistently lovely. The food was delicious a wonderful dinning experience. Recommend highly.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: Such a cozy place and wonderful staff! The food is delicious! They just need to have a heavier pour with wine. Thatâ€™s my only suggestion.

Name: 1770 House
Comments: 1770 House was fabulous, as usual. Going there for Restaurant Week made it a tremendous bargain. I still would highly recommend it even when it is not Restaurant Week.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Fabulous food served in outdoor patio dining all with appropriate distancing and masks. ðŸ’œ

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Food was delicious, every course was tasty and satisfying, while bringing unique flavors perfectly cooked. Yes it was expensive but great value, who wants to pay less and not receive unique and tasty dining. And, the service was truly excellent, amazing to see the numbers of wait staff, and all so enthusiastic!  The only improvement suggested Is to have more outdoor seating, hard to do while social distancing but necessary.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Words cannot describe the incredible dining experience we had at Arethusa al Tavolo. We were impressed from start to finish with service and food and will definitely go back for another fine dinner.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Food was AMAZING! I would 100% recommend it! The service was great also!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Exceptional experience!  A must experience for any foodie out there and for anyone who appreciates quality, locally produced food.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: My wife and I went out for our 26th Wedding Anniversary.  Everything was wonderful and we look forward to coming back.  They treat you like family.  We love this restaurant!Peter Cordeau

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Food was unique and beautifully presented BUT the restaurant was so dark that we had to use our cellphone flashlights to see the menu and although the food looked like pieces of art  the room was too dark to really appreciate it.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: This is our go to fine dining experience in Connecticut.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: This was our second time eating at Arethusa al Tavolo and it didnâ€™t disappoint. Prices are average for fine dining but the food and service are outstanding which makes it completely worth it. Canâ€™t wait to go back again!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Outstanding from beginning to end. Our favorite restaurant hands down! From the food to the service!!! Just absolutely incredible. Love our date nights at Arethusa Al Tavolo!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Wow! Usually the veggies play 2nd fiddle in the entree, not here, they were just as much a star of the meal as the rest of the dish. I know they grow their own vegetables on the their farm, but the preparation was fantastic. We are definitely going back.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Lovely destination restaurant...people travel from miles for good reason.  Suggest making your reservations well in advance.  Be sure to check out the Bakery across the street to bring a bit back home (and because you may not have room for dessert) also the Ice Creamery and Cheese shop next door...

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Always a great experience! Drinks, food, atmosphere are all top notch. Highly recommended!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Overall I would give a good rating. the service was excellent with there attention to detail . The menu was pretentious  and difficult to understand, too many things in each dish. Less is more would be my recommendation. The ambience is not great with the tables to close together and no evidence of sound abatement. It was noisy and difficult to carry on a conversation. How ever I did enjoy the dinner and would recommend to anyone who does not mind the negatives.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Superb as always

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Honestly, this has been the first dining experience I've had in a while where every single step of the meal was noteworthy. We sat down and both my father and husband (who were celebrating their birthdays) were presented with hand written birthday cards from the owner. The wine selection was perfect, the gluten free bread was dynamite. And every part of the meal was amazing. Nothing was wasted.  The dynamics of all of the flavors were flawless. Seriously. Incredible meal. Thank you.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: The food was really very good and we enjoyed it. Thanks also for the thoughtfulness as we celebrated our anniversary - the card and ice cream were unexpected so thanks again. Overall we had  great experience and will recommend this to friends too.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Always consistently excellent food and service! Thank you for a wonderful dining experience!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: This is such a FABULOUS restaurant and the food is delicious. We just picked the wrong night and got seated in the bar area. There were people standing next to our table pretty much the whole night. It was hard for the waitress to serve us it was so crowded. They did try and ask people to move they just kept coming back. I would definitely go back it is my favorite restaurant. I would just ask for a different table OR not go by a holiday ( Valentine's day).

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Wonderful valentine lunch.  Great service and delicious meal.  We so enjoyed our visit and would highly recommend having a special lunch or dinner.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Everything is always great. We feel like they treat us like family. Great food, service and never disappointed.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Outstanding service. Lovely atmosphere and exception all food

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Without exaggeration, this was the best dining experience I've had in a long time.  Everything about it was superb from the terrific quality and sophistication of the food through the excellent service and overall classy vibe of the place.  The prices are appropriate for a high-end restaurant - it's worth the money.  We will definitely be going back regularly.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: As always a great meal

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: This was hands down the best fine dinning experience I have had. It was so good that I feel I could have randomly been brought anything from the menu aI would love it all. Worth every mile of the drive from Simsbury.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Amazing all the way!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: The unique combinations on ingredients are put together to make the most amazing dishes you will ever eat!   Food and service is OUTSTANDING.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: This restaurant is a real gem. Everything about it is quality- food, service, ambience. The menu is diverse and creative. It all works to stimulate the senses and make each dish better than the sum of the parts. While the preparation is inventive it remains appealing without being over the top or too fussy. This is one of the best restaurants anywhere.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Outstanding.  Service was impeccable, food and drinks excellent and Robert made our dining experience very personal.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Another fabulous lunch! Service and food 2nd to none.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Fabulous, period.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: One word... WOW! This was by far the easiest & fastest review Iâ€™ve ever written. This place is special from the moment you enter. There is a palpable â€˜prideâ€™ in the restaurant for all the employees - they are part of a terrific experience and make the diners feel it. The maitreâ€™d, Robert, was extremely attentive, but not intrusive throughout the meal. The servers knew what to recommend (this was our first visit), and the food was delivered quickly and steaming- perfect!Our entrees were the sea bass and chicken - could not have been more pleased with the choices. My feeling is that everything on the menu is superb! Before dinner, we traveled next door to the Arethusa Dairy and purchased a pint of their ice cream. They kept it frozen for us during dinner - a nice â€˜serviceâ€™.This is my favorite restaurant in Ct and we will be back for more visits! Bravo!!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Fabulous,wonderful,delicious.....EverytimeConsistent epic food and great service

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Anniversary

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Outstanding! The food is an 11 on a scale of 1-10. Do not miss trying their ice cream. It is the best youâ€™ll ever have.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: My family and I frequently dine at Arethusa al Tavolo and we always have a consistently wonderful time with delicious food and fantastic service!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Great cooking , menu , pace of thd meal and exceptional serviceA trademark of this restaurant.  The wine list is balanced and well thought out, the menu and cooking excellent ( and we are both lactose int),Great pleasure as always.Highly recommended AB

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Elegant setting with lovely service and very fine food. Just a little bit pricy for me with only compliments on our experience there.

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: Best food outside New York City hands down without a doubt at all!

Name: Arethusa al Tavolo
Comments: A very special place, I love the ambience, food is delicious and always good service, It is a bit of a drive for us, but worth it, Love it here.
